entries.title: What to know about Christian Walker and his star turn in Georgia’s Senate race
entries.description: Herschel Walker's son has taken a central role in the race after criticizing his father on social media this week.

entries.title: Republicans rally around Walker’s imperiled candidacy
entries.description: The Georgia Senate race is so close that Republicans can’t afford to give up on the flawed candidate.
